alert.note: Alert for Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Turner and northeastern Worth Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sylvester, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashburn, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Sumner, Coverdale, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Shingler, Dakota and Inaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
